mapper.sql: id, userid, tag_id, share_num, read_num, creat_num, insert_time, update_time
mapper.select: select u.tag_id,t.tag_name from t_user_tag u inner join t_tag t on u.tag_id=t.id where u.userid = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_tag (id, userid, tag_id, share_num, read_num, creat_num, insert_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
